title: LOVE
text:
I absolutely love buying threw this company. I am 53 years old and the crop top style is what I like to wear. SHEIN has the biggest selection of clothing, plus they offer free returns if your not happy. I read the reviews first to see if the size large runs true to size, most stew but some will say bigger or smaller. 

‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è‚ô•Ô∏è I wish more people would put in their body size, waist size, hip size abs photo of how it looks on yourself, as this helps other buyers to know what size to buy, off the shirt is tight fitting, out of the style is baggy etc.

title: Favorite online boutique
text: Honestly everything is so affordable from the clothes to home decor. I really love how big their  closet inventory is you can recreate so many out fits that you‚Äôve see your favorite celebrities wear for a more than reasonable price honestly it can be a little intimidating shopping online some times but with them they make everything so easy to search with all the different categories it makes online shopping so enjoyable and everything i gotten from there is such good quality it doesn‚Äôt look cheap at all and they always have some sort or deal or discount or free shipping going on so you save even more money and I love it you can buy a whole new wardrobe for literally less than like $200 bucks

title: Suggestion On Update For Lingerie Section
text: I love SHEIN. They give you coupons 24/7 and there was even a time where I wanted to return an item, but they let me keep it, and gave me a full refund because I ordered from them a few times. The main issues that I have with SHEIN is their lingerie section. Since all lingerie is nonrefundable, SHEIN should update the app where the customers can put in their size information for lingerie. For example, I wear a size 34A in bra, my bralette size is a Large, and my underwear size is X Large. I see the reviews and people say that the bra size is too big or to go a size down. That‚Äôs ok to see when it‚Äôs for outdoor clothing because it‚Äôs refundable, but when it comes to lingerie, that‚Äôs a problem because we have to worry about it being nonrefundable and not able to wear.

title: Love it!
text: I love SHEIN they are so cheap and adorable I litteraly got the cutest phone case for freaking 1.50$!!! Obviously there is shipping but even shipping is cheap cause some places shipping is like 5$ but normally on SHEIN it‚Äôs 3$ and if you think about it 2$ does make a difference and the only down side I will say is some of there things are deceiving like I found leggings I that were adorable and looked like long average leggings but when I looked at the measurements it said that it was actually almost like capri length but in the pic she‚Äôs just wearing long socks and I bought 2 adorable shirts but was sad when I realized they were see through but otherwise there accessories and bags,  phone cases, Jewelry, and much more! I would definitely recommend! I hope this helps <3

title: Great app & great store
text: As a young adult who jus moved out & got bills to pay & other responsibilities to take care off, SHEIN has been a go to for a while now. The app is really easy to use & it updates your feed based on your wishlist. Also, the more purchases you make, the more points you get back & on top of that, you can write reviews for free & get points back to get free clothes. I‚Äôve never personally had any issues with quality or bugs in the bags or nun like that. The only thing I‚Äôve gotta be careful with is my body shape. Since I‚Äôm busty & have wider hips, I do have to size up sometimes & read reviews to get feedback, but that‚Äôs really the only thing. If you looking for good quality clothes for cheap, download the app & get to shopping.

title: SHEIN
text: I absolutely love this app!! It is amazing! SHEIN is my favorite online store! This app has so many good quality‚Äôs: like when you by stuff nd you have a certain amount they give you a coupon, and they have amazing prices!!Right Now I have 8 things in my cart and it only cost me 40 dollars!! It is also great for family shopping! They have different categories that you can shop from: Women, Men, Teens, Kids, Toddlers, and even Pets!! They also have really cute accessories and make up! title: Reliably Great Fashion at a Fair Price
text:
I have purchased from SHEIN many times and have never been disappointed. I love browsing their site and finding deals on items I love. The quality of the clothing is great. I have found customer service to be helpful and responsive. I have never needed to return any items, but they have notified me if an order might be delayed and have even offered discounts on future orders as compensation; which I am perfectly satisfied with. 
As with any online store it is important to read reviews, measure and do your due diligence as a consumer before you purchase. SHEIN offers reviews on their site for each item and I always find them helpful and accurate. 
SHEIN has become my go to for online clothing purchases. Quality, fit and price that can‚Äôt be beat.

title: Great but...
text: Its a hit or miss situation. Some clothes are iffy, some are quite nice! Now for some tips: Even if the clothes have 5 star reviews, *always* READ what the reviews actually say say and look at reviews w pics so you know the quality n how they might actually look. A lot of people just put 5 star even if its bad quality. If you do this, you'll be more likely to actually get nice clothes. (TW ed?) check the measurements too (and know your measurements), sometimes theyll run a bit small or big. <3 so far ive only gotten one thing that i didnt like but it was mostly my bad (i have a small chest so that area of the shirt was way too big, make sure to keep that in mind too when buying certain shirts). I altered it to fit me better, but if you cant do that definitely check measurements before buying.

title: Love it!
text: Affordable (but not cheap) well made cloths for all sizes and syles! And they don‚Äôt have just clothes they have a variety of earrings bracelets all kinds of jewelry hats glasses hair stuff DIY sewing tools etc. they even have dishes in like Tupperware and they even have affordable stuff to store your jewelry and if you‚Äôre into selling jewelry and making it they have stuff to ship it in a little baggies and boxes they have way more than I realized if you just can‚Äôt get enough and you love shopping and you‚Äôll have four dollars don‚Äôt worry you can shop here for four dollars and get a couple things lolLike a pair of earrings or a couple of really cute hair clips that are so cool you never knew you needed them and now you don‚Äôt know how you lived without them

title: Excellent
text:
Shein is relatively user-friendly though I would prefer an easier way to navigate and create Wish Lists so that I can stay better organized and access them easier. As it is, I need to mark them with hearts to know I had already seen/ordered that particular item. 

Overall, there is a wide variety of products. One other suggestion would be navigation and finding out why clothing pops up when my history has been nothing but nails and self-care product searches. Otherwise, this is just a dangerously beautiful app and store to visit and shop at!! I definitely would not trade it in for any other shopping app available. Prices are more than reasonable! Shipping time needs work. 

Mahalo he nui loa.

title: Good Quality. Affordable Prices.
text:
SHEIN offers fashionable clothes for all types of style. They also sell many home and miscellaneous products. All of their products are good quality items at affordable prices. 

I usually hate shopping for clothes online because things don‚Äôt always fit right or they‚Äôre not the same in person as in the picture online. However, SHEIN gives you the exact size of each garment in detail. This feature especially helps me with buying clothes because I‚Äôm tall and I want to make sure my clothes reach a certain length. 

SHEIN has made online shopping easier and more affordable for me. I‚Äôve ordered around 15-20 things from SHEIN (clothes and miscellaneous) and I have not been disappointed yet.

title: I really love this site/app
text: Unlike another Chinese company that probably wishes they were as reliable asShein, You don‚Äôt have to worry about the quality of you are ordering. Shein makes a lot of their own clothing, shoes and accessories so everything has a label, size and what it‚Äôs made of. I also like that you can have prices shown in US dollars, and you can also filter by size. Their sizing charts are easy to read which makes buying the right size easier. They also have a great plus size section called Shein Curve . You can find amazing fashion and even 2 piece outfits for real affordable prices. They also do amazing collaborations, like with Katy Perry and (my favorite) Hello Kitty! So give them a try. Also you can return items shipped to the USA.

title: Amazing find
text: My niece has been telling me about shein for months. I finally made an order and could not believe how great of quality the items I ordered were. The low prices, free shipping, and large amount of coupons had me concerned about what I would receive. Everything I‚Äôve ordered for my daughter and I has been better quality than the stuff we buy in stores at much higher prices. The sweatpants, sweaters, and hoodies are unbelievably comfortable. The shirts and jeans are great quality (feel like Levi quality). They have almost literally everything! Decor, phone cases, linens, household storage goods, led lights, pet stuff, and so much more. So glad I downloaded and can‚Äôt believe their sales and the great finds we‚Äôve made. 100% recommend!!

title: IN LOVE
text: SHEIN is an app that can get you cute and affordable clothes accessory jewelry and honestly gifts for the family. They have so many toys and clothes and accessories and jewelry that you can get for your family or friends. Everything is cheap which I love. Plus it has a good quality which is a win win. All the clothes are in style and cute. A while ago I ordered a whole new style off of SHEIN. I am in love with everything that I have gotten and I will continue to order more. 100% percent recommend. The only not so great part, is that it takes a while to come in. So if you‚Äôre trying to get everything in under a week then I don‚Äôt recommend getting it a week before I recommend getting a couple weeks before the event/ occasion.

title: Okurrrrr.
text: The price point for the clothing isn‚Äôt bad. You definitely need to look at reviews first before purchasing. Some are great some aren‚Äôt! You can find some that are inexpensive and then you do find some that are more than what you‚Äôre willing to pay for. I‚Äôve gotten packages on here quite a bit and I love most of them each time. The lingerie on there is alright. Not super high quality but the price for it is what you get. Sad that your points expire after so long! I didn‚Äôt know that :( Cause when I purchase I wait a few months and then make a huge purchase instead of buying one thing or a few things at a time. I love it though. Love the oversized tees and that people leave reviews on the app bc it helps a lot!!

title: Love it!!!
text: SHEIN is by far one of the best, THE BEST, apps I have ever shopped from. When I fist download it I thought that it would be just like this other app I used to have, wish. Wish was an app you could shop from and everything was extremely cheap. But when the stuff I ordered came in it was all very crappy and poorly made. However, SHEIN surprised me quite a bit. I had ordered two bras, a bikini, pajamas , and sweatpants for only $21. It‚Äôs very cheap money wise, and made with great quality fabric. I love everything I buy from SHEIN. And they don‚Äôt just have clothes they have pretty much everything you could want. Makeup, jewelry, clothes, swimsuits, lingerie, etc. and the bast part, it offers you coupons when you order a certain amount of stuff!!!

title: It‚Äôs the real deal y‚Äôall!!!
text:
I have purchasedFrom them about five times now most of the times I‚Äôve purchased for myself but I was also purchased for my daughter who is nine years old. All of the items have fit very well and the few that didn‚Äôt it was easy to exchange and or return them without cause without problem and gettting my money back.  
The cold the quality of the clothes are as good as the price if not better so in some cases you may get what you pay for in most cases you get an exceptional quality. I would highly recommend them because the prices do not continue to go up most times they are going down they have sales coupons or something to keep me coming back

Update: I‚Äôve made 2 more purchases and they are absolutely the best.

title: I LOVE SHEIN
text: Absolutely the best clothing website/app I‚Äôve ordered from ! Read the reviews , check the photos & you‚Äôre pretty much good to go !! They tell you it‚Äôll be two weeks or so from the date and next thing you know , you‚Äôre clothes are shipped and delivered within a WEEK ! I‚Äôve ordered several times and each time I‚Äôve been super impressed ! Clothes are true to size , some reviews recommend you to size up , I listen !!! Don‚Äôt be hardheaded ! Size up ladies ! Or if MOST reviews recommend you to size down , plz DO ! Great fabric , nothing cheap , very inexpensive and honest reviews ! I couldn‚Äôt be more pleased with a website/app ! I love how you can earn points toward purchases !!! This app is everything ! Enjoy ladies ! From swimsuits to dresses to two pieces , I haven‚Äôt been let down YET ! Love love love it

title: SHEIN STYLE
text: Do you love clothes? I know I do! And even if you don‚Äôt love clothes everyone has to wear them! You know what‚Äôs better than clothes? Clothes on sal! There are so many varieties of clothes from newborns all the way to adults and stuff for all different body types! How accommodating! They even have clothes that will satisfy your grumpy aunt‚Ä¶ Well mostly satisfy them but you know how Karen‚Äôs can be! And you know what else!? They have MORE than just clothes! Need storage solutions? SHEIN has em! Need stuff for your new apartment? SHEIN has your back! Need a new love interest? Well‚Ä¶ SHEIN isn‚Äôt a match maker but with all the new clothes and your newly decorated apartment SHEIN got you halfway there! So go and flaunt your beautiful self and live your best life! Thanks SHEIN for affordable style and MORE!

title: 70% off sale is a rip-off and misleading!
text: I really enjoyed this website, I even told friends about it. However, they sent me an email on Black Friday saying that everything is 70% off, so I HAD to go rack up on something‚Äôs. Unfortunately, when I got on the website I learned that things were NOT actually 70% off. Instead they put a higher price in small writing and lined it out and put a cheaper price as the final price to make it seem as if you were getting a deal. If you shop on this site frequently you will know that the final price has ALWAYS been that price before this sell. You‚Äôre not really getting a deal, only getting tricked. This is misleading advertisement and the quality of the materials they send aren‚Äôt even all that great most times. They have a couple of things that actually look good when you receive them, but for the most part their prices are low because the quality is too. I knew there was a catch to them having 70% off of there already pretty low prices.

title: It‚Äôs a little addictive
text: The prices are so good I can‚Äôt shop anywhere else. My last order I got 5 shirts and 2 pairs of pants for under fifty bucks. You have to take advantage of the points you can earn by checking in daily, doing reviews with pics and searching for coupons on line. There‚Äôs some drawbacks, the material can be weird, you just don‚Äôt know until you get it, but I‚Äôve only sent things back a couple of times because of poor quality materials. My biggest complaint is that they don‚Äôt make sleeves long enough, shirts, sweaters sweatshirts, jackets, coats. They do have free returns, it‚Äôs usually about a week before you get your money back which is nice. I took away 1 star because of the shortness on the sleeves. Give it a try and if you don‚Äôt like it return it‚Ä¶.

title: Wow
text: I have been incredibly impressed with Shein honestly. Not only is it a quick and easy way to shop for clothes and things, but super cheap too! Everything I‚Äôve gotten so far (and I‚Äôve gotten quite a bit already for only having it for like a month) has been super accurate to what I ordered, unlike some other apps *cough wish cough* and most of it has fit perfect. Only one item was wonky and that could have been operator error. Some things quality isn‚Äôt top notch, but what do you expect for a $2 shirt?! It‚Äôs still nice stuff and amazing for the price! Especially with the constant coupons and deals they have going on‚Ä¶ Really overall, amazing app. I certainly recommend it, for men and women and everyone alike!

title: Delivery
text: I ordered clothes for my family for our upcoming vacation. Order was suppose to arrive between September 1st through September 4th. I get a notification that my order will be delivered by September 1st I wait for my order it doesn‚Äôt arrive. Couple days afterwards I get another notification stating my package was delivered, I go outside to check it‚Äôs not there! I give it until the next day still not there!! I reach out to customer support and they made me feel like I was an incompetent customer!! They advised me to look at the picture and to ask my neighbors. The picture shown isn‚Äôt even the front of my house!!! None of the ‚Äúsurroundings‚Äù as they called it aren‚Äôt even my neighborhood!! They didn‚Äôt offer me a refund or anything just an apology. I will never shop on Shein again!!!! If I can give 0 stars I would! Anyone trying to order from Shein for the first time be aware someone else will receive your package you‚Äôre just paying for it!!!!

title: You get what you pay for
text:
Shein is an amazing market, with a big variety of clothing and accessories. If there‚Äôs a specific piece you‚Äôre hunting for you might just find it there.

The only backside is the big difference in the quality of the clothing, but then again it‚Äôs pretty cheap compared to other places. You can definitely grab great deals of good quality finds. Sizing is also very up and down, do your work before buying, measure yourself. Look at the measurements on the product, if it specifies what the model wear look at that too. And if you‚Äôre lucky enough, there are reviews with photos from other people that bought the product. So you can see the product on someone that might be about the same as you. 

They give you rewards and coupons too üî•

title: Best app EVER!!
text:
I absolutely LOVE Shein, it‚Äôs the best shopping app in my opinion. There are TONS of things to choose from! I‚Äôve bought all sorts of stuff ranging from clothes to kitchen gadgets and beauty supplies. Every time I get a product in the mail, I am always flabbergasted at how amazing the products are. Great material for clothes and sturdy plastic/metals for other items. If you haven‚Äôt used Shein before, I definitely recommend getting on and buying to your hearts content‚Ä¶you WON‚ÄôT be disappointed!! Thanks Shein‚Ä¶I LOVE your online store!!! I am addicted 100% :) 
Oh and the best thing I almost forgot to mention, if you download the app you can check-in every day to receive ‚ÄúShein points‚Äù which is real money to use however you want in the app!! Shein is a life changer!!

title: Price becomes expensive
text:
Dear Shein support team. As a matter of equality, we, the Moroccan shoppers community in your domain, decided to defend our rights and complain about the racist facts that we face each time we use your website. 
Please let me explain that it's absolutely unacceptable how your company treats some countries' residents as inferior whereas some others benefit from a wide range of pros!
 This is ridiculous since I (One of the Moroccan shoppers) and everyone holding the same nationality as me, are getting triggered whenever we shop from your website, because we find ourselves an unwanted entity starting from the bad service client treatment to the awful and high listed prices, where in the other hand other nationalities benefit, as we mentioned above, from a variety of facilities which made some of us change their identity to a Saudi ID just to purchase an item with a reasonable price. 
Then, can you please give us a direct and clear answer why most of middle eastern countries are having a good shopping journey but we don't! This is absolutely based on a racist scale and no one will accept it! 
I hope to get a reply as soon as possible with clear explanations so we can know how to react. 
Regards.

title: Make sure you don‚Äôt return anything you won‚Äôt see it again
text:
I have buy stuff from this app multiple times, mostly good experiences until I had to do my first return.  

I got 20 items (cause their measurements are always wrong) I kept 11 and return 9. Well usps gave me a tracking number, my package was delivered last week but the app says it hasn‚Äôt being deliver, I already know where this is gonna end.  They have no phone number available so there is no one you can actually talk to, no only that but the messages you can send on the app it‚Äôs ridiculous you aren‚Äôt actually talking to anyone it only predetermined messages which most of them have nothing to do with the problem I am confronting.  

I would say it‚Äôs okay to buy from this app but be aware if you don‚Äôt like something or they screw up somehow your only two options are to keep your item no matter what or presses a return and never see your money or items back.

title: If I could give Shein zero stars, I would.
text:
You must be joking if you still think this company holds any ounce of legitimacy. This company rips of designs of small, indie clothing brands and talented artists. They mass produce these items and sell them for horrifyingly low prices, which has degraded the entire fashion industry. ‚ÄúIf I could buy it for $5 on shein, why would I support your business instead?‚Äù. If you buy from Shein:
You are purchasing clothing made from the hands of women and children who have never been paid a fair salary. It has been compared to slavery, the conditions these people work to make your clothes in.
You are funding a system that has pushed MANY small designers and clothing brands (many who are minority or women owned, ethically sourced, etc) towards bankruptcy, and a company who responded to complaints and copyright violations with the same impersonal, cookie cutter Instagram DM.
There aren‚Äôt many things I will NEVER do in this world, but buy from this company is one of them.

title: SO MAD !!!!!
text: DO NOT PUT YOUR CREDIT CARD INFO I TO THIS SITE I had all of my money stolen from me off of this site and put into some PayPal account I‚Äôm so upset it was all of my birthday money and it was in this stupid app because they don‚Äôt have a safe check apparently and this is so wrong that they are aloud on the App Store when they don‚Äôt take the proper precautions to make sure there customers don‚Äôt get hacked now I have to wait up to 90 days for the credit card company to do an investigation and try to get my money back and even then we don‚Äôt know if I‚Äôll get it back this has caused me so much anxiety and has made me so extremely upset I will NEVER. Be shopping from this app agian and that‚Äôs a shame cause I‚Äôve shopped here before and you have cute clothes but it‚Äôs not worth getting all of your money stolen if my credit card company does not get my money back I‚Äôm going to be extremely up set and I‚Äôm gonna expect the SHEIN company to give me all of my money back because this is just ridiculous and inconvenient!!!!!!

title: Love SHEIN!
text:
I first saw SHEIN on Instagram as an add. I didn‚Äôt bother clicking because I‚Äôm always skeptical of clothing adds on social media. I saw the add a couple more times and decided to check out the app just to see what it was about because the clothes they were advertising were so cute. The clothes are SO inexpensive which also made me skeptical so I did some research, and it all seemed legit so I decided to buy some T-shirts just to try it out. And I am SO impressed! My first order I got 8 tops for $57! üò± The quality is top notch, it‚Äôs all true to size and just so cute! 
They have an incredible variety of clothing, housewares and so much more. I‚Äôve ordered twice already and I‚Äôm waiting on my third order now. I would recommend everyone try it out! I‚Äôm so happy and will be doing much more shopping here!

title: Good business !
text: After read tons of good reviews and kept seeing ads I‚Äôve decided to order and I went big almost $200üòÇ. ( they are so cute couldn‚Äôt resist ) I was so nervous because I ordered clothes from China before and the quality definitely wasn‚Äôt like pictures. They split my order into 2 shipments. Anyways I definitely will keep shopping here and intend to change all of my clothes in my closet to be SHEIN ! üòÇ

title: Best shopping app ever
text: This is the best shopping app ever because it has a variety of things for kids, adults and men and it is even better because the prices are super reasonable and depending on what you‚Äôve joined or not, you can, or cannot get free shipping but the prices are mega cheap. You cannot find cheap prices like this. Almost anywhere online, this would be a great place to browse on your free time and for when you‚Äôre bored and need something to do. This. is the coolest app in the world and anyone can do it kids towards anyone but I would recommend the the age 12 or older just because little kids probably don‚Äôt have that much money saved up but otherwise this is the best app for kids or adults anything

title: Great shopping experience
text: Some items can tend to be a bit shorter than I‚Äôd like but that is the style these days with the crop stops and what not. I just purchased 15 clothing items from shorts to tops and spent only $55. It arrived in about 1 week. The quality varies from piece to piece but because I always purchase the deeply discounted items, I have very little issue with this. Typically the quality is sufficient for repeated use regardless. And oftentimes the quality well exceeds my expectations. I also purchased some kitchen items, duffle bags, and kids sunglasses that were each less than a dollar. All around great experience. Highly recommend. Take your measurements and follow that for sizing. I‚Äôm approximately a size 18/20 or 3X.

title: Great!
text: I started looking at Shein about two months ago because I always saw it on Instagram and I am definitely not disappointed in the purchases I have made. I haven‚Äôt had a problem at all when it comes to measurements of clothes and my advice to anyone that usually does, is to look at the reviews of the clothing you want and read the comments. The customers on there are very honest and a lot of them post pictures of how the clothes look like on a woman that isn‚Äôt exactly like the model. Everything is very reasonably priced, the only thing that really gets to me is the shipping costs...it does make the purchase a little more pricey than I would have liked but quality of items I get are worth it. Love this store and I can‚Äôt wait for future purchases!

title: Great cheap clothes
text:
Efficient and fast shipping all considering. Hard to tell fabric from photos- items often are different in person than I expected but that‚Äôs just shopping online and at these prices it‚Äôs fine‚Ä¶just don‚Äôt get your heart set on a stretchy fabric or a gauzy one - just roll with it. Measure yourself - look at the sizing - it‚Äôs not a US company and doesn‚Äôt always line up but is almost always accurate to the measurements given in the description.

Recently one of my orders never came. I had to contact the company over and over asking for a refund (we‚Äôre taking 8 weeks late) and finally they did refund it. I don‚Äôt think it should take 3 messages from me when a shipment so clearly never shipped BUT they did refund it, and make it right in the end.

title: Amazing! Just a few things
text: She in is AMAZING! All of the clothes are trendy. There are a few downsides, though. Some of the clothes I have purchased have shrunk while washing. The tags are itchy as well. Some are crop tops, and do not say. And all of the clothes for girls that have straps, the straps are EXTREMELY wrong. Now for the good sides! The clothes are amazing, super comfy. Very easy to order, but they do come in around 10 days. SO worth it though! I definitely recommend this app. The bad sides are very minor. There is ONE huge problem though. There have been rumors that say SHEIN overworks their workers. Some have even been sending help messages in the tags.  I don‚Äôt know if this is true. Sometimes SHEIN steals designs from others. But, it‚Äôs a great app, and I love it!

title: Its a 8/10 for me
text: Some of my orders are great. They came either a day early or a few days late. But lately I‚Äôve been ordering home stuff like; a desk or hangers etc. Those things I bought never came. They told me it‚Äôs was a ‚Äúpeak sale season‚Äù but I don‚Äôt care. I ordered those with my money. It should come on time just as it came on time for my clothes. Not to be a Karen or anything but this is getting ridiculous. SHEIN please do better. I know there‚Äôs some delays with the airlines and stuff but it concerns me. One of my order wouldn‚Äôt come and it‚Äôs been over a month now. I‚Äôm not sure if my dad got his money back. I tried to check in with the shein chat but they told me the same thing over and over again, ‚Äúwe might have to check in on your order or we can message you once we get something out of who ever is taking your order.‚Äù

title: Worst customer service EVER. SHEIN IS TRASH
text: Don‚Äôt use this app if you can‚Äôt take being furious with the ridiculous level of ignorance customer service displays. I have been chatting with no less than 6 different agents (because I keep getting passed from one idiot to another) for over a week now. This issue I have is simple IF ANY ONE OF THE IDIOTS I HAVE SPOKEN TO COULD UNDERSTAND SIMPLE ENGLISH, which they clearly can‚Äôt. All they do is copy and paste stupid generic responses over and over that have no bearing on what you‚Äôre asking or seeking. Then they transfer you to a different person who starts all over doing the same mess. I‚Äôm sure they just want to make you mad so you will give up, but they picked the wrong one today. I have time and I am FURIOUS with all of it. Don‚Äôt waste your time downloading, shopping, browsing, or even thinking about this company. And for goodness sake don‚Äôt share it to anyone if you want them to think you have half a brain. What a joke of a company.

title: Not please with their low transparency
text: Shein is VERY TRICKY with their mini games and prizes. Be careful!!! You could refer many new users and they will not credit you for it. New users access your link and do every step but shein will only count them if they access your link a second time (Not always though) Sometimes it will just say existing user even if they download and signup with your link. The trick is that no one will count on the first click and the second click could mess everything. That is business! If you offer give or don‚Äôt offer. Play clean and be transparent about the amount of friend to invite and honor the first click. Is not easy to convince people and once they are, shein deceive them. How can you trust when you do everything on your end but shein is ensuring you don‚Äôt make it to the gift. I referred 17 new people in 5 round by now and only got it one time because I was able to figure their meticulous trick! Wrong!

title: My shein review
text: Shein has really helped me step up my style I‚Äôm 13 years old and weigh 96 pounds finding clothes to where that weren‚Äôt too big for me was hard I wanted to fit in with all the other girls and have nice looking clothes but everything was just so expensive!! I discovered shein around 2021 when I purchased my first order I was very surprised with what I received! I could by clothes for a affordable cost that are in style and fit me. Not only do they have clothing I also have bought phone cases, claw clips, jewelry etc. The only thing I‚Äôve found that was a problem was my fault because I didn‚Äôt measure myself I just put what I thought was my size and it came way to small always check the measurements!!!

title: Love
text:
The clothes in this store are like so amazing that I‚Äôm sad to have to leave a 4 star anything I‚Äôve ever bought from here have been the best quality I‚Äôve had a set of shorts from here I bought two years ago and I wear them so often at home and they haven‚Äôt even ripped.
 I just recently ran into a problem having to do with shipping  and the shipping company telling me to contact the seller when I did that it‚Äôs impossible to get a human on the chat line to help with the problem the bot is not helpful at all and the question you ask you get an answer that has nothing to do with that you ask. The only thing I would say to improve would be either getting a human to do your online chats or updating your bot because I really love the stuff in your store

title: The best fashion at the best price
text: I love Shein. Whether you need affordable and very fashionable office wear, jewelry, purses, street clothes, pajamas, or dog beds/toys‚Äî you can find it all here for a very affordable price! The reviews have pictures so you can really see how the clothes look on regular people. The fashion is unbeatable. I get compliments on every outfit and no one ever has the same outfit as me. Shipping can take a little while but with the price it‚Äôs worth the wait. I‚Äôve been using them regularly for years now. They have such a variety and once again‚Äî the price, you just can‚Äôt beat it. I get entire classy office outfits for around $17 and I look like million bucks. Really great app for those who want to look nice at an affordable price. Thanks SheIn!

title: I shein
text:
My review

                  I love my clothes that came I love my orders that came everything fit me so well I‚Äôm not doing I know how to return order but even though I don‚Äôt I still kept the clothes that I couldn‚Äôt fit I really love buying from ShinneIt‚Äôs the firstIt‚Äôs the first website that I ever use to order clothes off of it to be honest it will be the only website that I will use to buy clothes off of because the only website I trust so congratulations good job Shinne I will continue to order my clothes online from now thank you very much for your business and your service and even though their clothes affordable they‚Äôre not cheap in material of clothing I can wash and dry my dress is my shorts outfit and we where am again

title: lovely, but a few things :)
text: Shein is amassing completely legit and i love it! I will say that the sun glasses i got it was made completely out of plastic witch i wasn‚Äôt the best, the skirt was poorly made and the shirt was an obvious print from google. i ordered a dress with a butterfly in the middle but the butterfly was just fabric and it was obvious, it would‚Äôve been better if it was a sowed on patch. other then that everything was great! i was vary pleased i expected my package to come later but it arrived 4 days early. amazing!, though the product may not be the best on quality i love how it looks, and feels. it makes me feel confident and glowing. the fabric isn‚Äôt the best and i hope it will be better in a few years time but it definitely looks amazing.

title: I ü´∂üèΩ SHEIN but here are my thoughts
text:
I LOVE SHEIN but sometimes it it‚Äôs t the best place to shop at. SHEIN I nice and has cheap/affordable prices but sometimes that‚Äôs the problem. SHEIN‚Äôs QUALITY is sometimes REALLY CHEAP. It‚Äôs nice and all but I occasionally sometimes get a hole in my shirt or rip. Or the packaging look messed up and looks like it was thrown around and smushed underneath something. And I hate how during fun things like spin the wheel for a prize it‚Äôs 10% OFF for $50+
Like what‚Äôs the point of giving a coupon with a terrible deal, I have to spend a bunch of money or for a few bucks to be taken off?
And the express shipping is SO EXPENSIVE! And the regular shipping should go down a $1-for example if I‚Äôm getting something like butterfly hair clips that are $2.50 the shipping is $3.99!AND PLUS TAX which is 0.20 (not that much I know but it all adds up)
Then my total is already around $7 for 2.50 hair clips.
BUT THERE IS SOME GOOD THINGS!
Like I said OCCASIONALLY! I get bad quality packaging and product but most of the time it‚Äôs very good! I also wish that all the cute designs on teen girls shirts aren‚Äôt so cropped, I get crop tops are trending and lots of people like it but I would also like to wear it at school without getting dress coded

title: Never had a bad experience!
text: I‚Äôve ordered probably about 20 things on shein so far, everything came as planned. The best part about this is that literally everything came in a week. The original delivery date was 2 weeks later! Just because the shipping is long doesn‚Äôt mean it‚Äôs going to be THAT long. I love shein and their system. And let‚Äôs not forget about their large inventory! I got my mom hooked on it as well. She can find beautiful jewelry (the jewelry is great!) and masks that she actually likes. We have these pair of earring for 50 dollars that we got at some store. They make my ears ich so bad! We ordered a pair from shein for 5 dollars and they were so comfy, didn‚Äôt leave any green, and looked amazing! That‚Äôs only one example of how good this online store is. Once again, thanks shein :)

title: Disappointed. SHEIN as some work to do
text: I must say I was super hyped about using SHEIN, my sister and co-worker had bought items from them and were satisfied with what they had purchased. They had a great deal of trendy and stylish clothing advertised. I ended up ordering 3 shirts and four pairs of pants. It shipped and was on my doorstep within a couple days which was great. Just as excited as I was to finally see all these nice things I ordered. That excitement quickly turned into disappointment. The saying is looks can be deceiving, well this was far from true. All the pants I had ordered looked and fit nothing like how they were advertised. They were baggy and poorly made. Needless to say I wasted not time returning the items for a refund which only took 7 hours. Comparing SHEIN to Fashion Nova, SHEIN has a lot of work to do. They can start my selling exactly what they advertise. Until then. Fashion Nova will be my go to for online shopping, and SHEIN will be number 3.

title: Didn‚Äôt trust it, now I love it
text: I was for sure that this is one of those scam websites where nothing looks like the picture and you may or may not ever receive your package like some of the others. But everything on here (that I‚Äôve bought) is a great deal and really good quality for the price. When you can buy 8 things for $60 hopefully you don‚Äôt expect them to last you the rest of your life! But if you like changing up your wardrobe on a regular basis, this site is perfect! Tons of on trend clothes and home items for way less than you‚Äôd pay at any in store retailer for new like-items! Plus, the shipping was actually pretty quick! Most places when it ships from China, it takes 1-2 months to come in! My order was here in a week! Highly recommend!

title: Horrible app and company.
text:
This app is very hard to navigate. I created an account and when you go into order history, things are very iffy. I would take screen shots of every purchase you make as well as any returns. When you try to view them on the app it‚Äôs hard to find. Things get deleted and moved to separate areas. I returned part of my order but instead of showing that I placed an original order and then a return in a separate area, it removed the items from my initial purchase as if I never bought it at all. On the desktop I was actually able to see a real return history. 
Also, this company WILL scam you out of your money. I tried getting a refund on items I shipped back and they refuse. I opened a PayPal dispute and they told me they will not refund me until I close my dispute. They also told PayPal there is no return created. This is why proper records would come in handy. 
Avoid this place like the plague.

title: I loooove shein
text: At first my dad said I shouldn‚Äôt get this app because everything on shein is cheap crap but after my first couple orders I realized that even tho they weren‚Äôt the best material it didn‚Äôt matter because they fit for the occasion I needed them to. And even just looking on the app is so fun. It kinda gives you a sense of what‚Äôs trending and in style. I love just scrolling through shein and looking at tops, bottoms, phone cases, accessories ect. My first purchase was about 9 phone cases and the total was 25 dollars. They came and they worked perfectly. I thought they would be cheap and really thin but they are actually really useful (and reeeally cute). I‚Äôm so glad I got this app and I will definitely keep purchasing things from shein!!!
